name: Dem Bill the Lumberjack sein Adventure
name_original: Dem Bill the Lumberjack sein Adventure
description:
A fantastic game. With five types of crates (they even turn)! Amazing enemies! And Walls!

This is the story of a lumberjack named Bill. He had an adventure. And because he never had the chance to tell it, we decided to tell this EPIC TALE on our own.

May you never cross ways with an adventure again, Bill.

Look with the mouse, move with WASD!

Credits:

Gameplay - Barbossa

Bill und Freunde (aka Art) - psychokill
